roleset.name: serve as an example of a class

example.name: typify-v: representative example
example.text: Givaudan Far East Ltd. , a Swiss concern that sells chemicals to shampoo and soap factories in China , typifies the problems .

propbank.arg: Givaudan Far East Ltd. , a Swiss concern that sells chemicals to shampoo and soap factories in China

roleset.note: TYPIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'typify' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'typical' based on BOLT-2,3. No Verbnet entry. (from typify.01-v)

roleset.name: usual

example.name: typical-j: both args
example.text: Brief afternoon storms are very typical for Boulder summers .

example.name: typical-j
example.text: The stats are clear : IED victims make up a bigger chunk of our casualties every month . Over the last six months , IEDs have caused 63 % of US combat deaths . Last month -LRB- October 2005 -RRB- was typical : out of 96 US troops killed , IEDs were responsible for 57 .

roleset.note: TYPICAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from typical.01-j)
